description: Adds elements that match the selector to currently selected elements. Context is optional to specify where to start matching the element and the selector.
Adds the previous selection to the current selection, optionally filtered by a selector.
returns: The originally selected <p> element and its immediately following sibling.

description: Gets the children of selected element, including text and comment nodes.
returns: Contents of the <p> element with id "found"

description: Ends the most recent filtering operation and returns the set of selected elements to its previous state.
